name: Path of the Gunslinger
description:
This action packed western shooter will be sure to get your heart rate up!  Take up the mantel of gunslinger as you battle through five exciting levels, battling fierce raiders, massive scorpions, mysterious shamans, and many other threats!  This game is in an unfinished state, and thus is being published for two main purposes:  Firstly, to get feedback on the gameplay mechanics so I can learn how to improve them, and secondly, to showcase the art assets that appear in the game, which are all hand drawn by me and are available on my page.  Please give them a look if you are interested, and be sure to leave feedback on what you like and don't like.  There will most likely be some issues/bugs, so any help finding them and improving the game is appreciated.  Thanks!

Controls:

[WASD] -- Move

[Left Mouse Button] -- Shoot

[Right Mouse Button] -- Jump (bullets and pits can be jumped over)

[F] -- Toggle Fullscreen

[P] -- Restart Game
